titles.title: VetPAC Act of 2025
VetPAC Act of 2025
VetPAC Act of 2025
VetPAC Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a commission to review operations at the Veterans Health Administration and submit to Congress reports with respect to that review, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Reported by Senator Moran with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 119-98.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 279.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee substitute as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
